LanguageData.GorFaction.label: gor herd
LanguageData.GorFaction.description: Gathering of destructive gors. A vile herd of beastmen that roams and raids the lands.
LanguageData.GorPlayerFaction.label: herd outcast
LanguageData.GorPlayerFaction.description: A bestigor that lost a duel. Cast out of the herd, now a outcast that has to build their own herd.
LanguageData.BeastmenPlayerFaction.label: beastmen colony
